meanings.definition: A unit of volume equal to 10 liters.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for two dekalitres of water to make the soup.
meanings.sent2: The farmer stored the milk in dekalitres to keep it fresh.
meanings.sent3: The dekalitres of lemonade at the party disappeared in no time!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like dekalitres of joy overflowing.
meanings.sent5: The dekalitres of rain that fell made the streets glisten with wetness.

meanings.sent1: The store sold dekalitres of soda for the party.
meanings.sent2: The fish tank needed a few dekalitres of water to be full.
meanings.sent3: The dekalitres of juice spilled all over the kitchen floor!
meanings.sent4: His love for her was like dekalitres of sweetness in a cup.
meanings.sent5: The dekalitres of oil in the engine kept the car running smoothly.
